summary: An email from attorney Jesse Mautner to a prosecutor (likely in the SDNY) indicating that at least one of his law firm's clients is willing to assist in the investigation against Ghislaine Maxwell and has potential evidence against her. The email seeks to confirm interest and determine next steps.

persons.name: Jesse Mautner
persons.context: Author of the email, an attorney at Merson Law, PLLC, who is communicating on behalf of a client willing to assist in the Ghislaine Maxwell investigation.

persons.name: Jordan Merso
persons.context: Referenced in the email as the intended recipient; the email is a follow-up to a previous communication from him.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the investigation; the email discusses a client with potential evidence against her.

connections.description: Mautner is following up with Merso regarding a client's willingness to assist in the Maxwell investigation.
Mautner represents a client who has potential evidence against Maxwell and is offering assistance to prosecutors.

events.title: Attorney offers client assistance in Maxwell investigation
events.description: Attorney Jesse Mautner emails prosecutor Jordan Merso to confirm that at least one client with potential evidence against Ghislaine Maxwell is ready to assist the investigation.

locations.context: Address of Merson Law, PLLC, the law firm of Jesse Mautner.

keyFacts: An attorney, Jesse Mautner, reached out to a prosecutor (Jordan Merso) on July 3, 2020, regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell investigation.
Mautner indicates that at least one of his firm's clients possesses potential evidence specifically against Ghislaine Maxwell and is willing to assist prosecutors.
The email is a follow-up, suggesting prior communication about the possibility of client cooperation.
The correspondence is marked as confidential and protected by attorney-client privilege.
The document shows active efforts by law firms to facilitate witness cooperation with the government in the Maxwell case in mid-2020.
